tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_id AS SELECT con.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, ind.code AS name, ind.indicator_id AS amp_me_indicator_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator ind WHERE ((ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id) AND ((con.sub_clazz)::text = 'a'::text));;;
